# API Reference for cdktf.HttpBackendProps

   HttpBackendProps <a name="HttpBackendProps" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps"></a>
  
  Stores the state using a simple REST client.
  
  State will be fetched via GET, updated via POST, and purged with DELETE.
  The method used for updating is configurable.
  
  This backend optionally supports state locking.
  When locking support is enabled it will use LOCK and UNLOCK requests providing the lock info in the body.
  The endpoint should return a 423: Locked or 409: Conflict with the holding lock info when
  it's already taken, 200: OK for success. Any other status will be considered an error.
  The ID of the holding lock info will be added as a query parameter to state updates requests.
  
  Read more about this backend in the Terraform docs:
  https://www.terraform.io/language/settings/backends/http
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```java
  import com.hashicorp.cdktf.HttpBackendProps;
  
  HttpBackendProps.builder()
      .address(java.lang.String)
  //  .lockAddress(java.lang.String)
  //  .lockMethod(java.lang.String)
  //  .password(java.lang.String)
  //  .retryMax(java.lang.Number)
  //  .retryWaitMax(java.lang.Number)
  //  .retryWaitMin(java.lang.Number)
  //  .skipCertVerification(java.lang.Boolean)
  //  .unlockAddress(java.lang.String)
  //  .unlockMethod(java.lang.String)
  //  .updateMethod(java.lang.String)
  //  .username(java.lang.String)
      .build();
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.address">address</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) The address of the REST endpoint. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.lockAddress">lockAddress</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The address of the lock REST endpoint. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.lockMethod">lockMethod</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The HTTP method to use when locking. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.password">password</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The password for HTTP basic authentication. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryMax">retryMax</a></code> | <code>java.lang.Number</code> | (Optional) The number of HTTP request retries. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryWaitMax">retryWaitMax</a></code> | <code>java.lang.Number</code> | (Optional) The maximum time in seconds to wait between HTTP request attempts. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryWaitMin">retryWaitMin</a></code> | <code>java.lang.Number</code> | (Optional) The minimum time in seconds to wait between HTTP request attempts. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.skipCertVerification">skipCertVerification</a></code> | <code>java.lang.Boolean</code> | (Optional) Whether to skip TLS verification. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.unlockAddress">unlockAddress</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The address of the unlock REST endpoint. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.unlockMethod">unlockMethod</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The HTTP method to use when unlocking. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.updateMethod">updateMethod</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) HTTP method to use when updating state. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.username">username</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Optional) The username for HTTP basic authentication. |

  ## `address`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="address" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.address"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getAddress();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Required) The address of the REST endpoint.
  
  ---
  
  ## `lockAddress`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="lockAddress" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.lockAddress"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getLockAddress();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Optional) The address of the lock REST endpoint.
  
  Defaults to disabled.
  
  ---
  
  ## `lockMethod`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="lockMethod" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.lockMethod"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getLockMethod();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Optional) The HTTP method to use when locking.
  
  Defaults to LOCK.
  
  ---

  - *Type:* java.lang.String

  ## `retryMax`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="retryMax" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryMax"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.Number getRetryMax();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.Number
  
  (Optional) The number of HTTP request retries.
  
  Defaults to 2.
  
  ---
  
  ## `retryWaitMax`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="retryWaitMax" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryWaitMax"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.Number getRetryWaitMax();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.Number
  
  (Optional) The maximum time in seconds to wait between HTTP request attempts.
  
  Defaults to 30.
  
  ---
  
  ## `retryWaitMin`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="retryWaitMin" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.retryWaitMin"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.Number getRetryWaitMin();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.Number
  
  (Optional) The minimum time in seconds to wait between HTTP request attempts.
  
  Defaults to 1.
  
  ---
  
  ## `skipCertVerification`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="skipCertVerification" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.skipCertVerification"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.Boolean getSkipCertVerification();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.Boolean
  
  (Optional) Whether to skip TLS verification.
  
  Defaults to false.
  
  ---
  
  ## `unlockAddress`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="unlockAddress" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.unlockAddress"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getUnlockAddress();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Optional) The address of the unlock REST endpoint.
  
  Defaults to disabled.
  
  ---
  
  ## `unlockMethod`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="unlockMethod" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.unlockMethod"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getUnlockMethod();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Optional) The HTTP method to use when unlocking.
  
  Defaults to UNLOCK.
  
  ---
  
  ## `updateMethod`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="updateMethod" id="cdktf.HttpBackendProps.property.updateMethod"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getUpdateMethod();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Optional) HTTP method to use when updating state.
  
  Defaults to POST.
